thread.section_title: Airtasker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airtasker | www.airtasker.com | 2 of 58
thread.title: Danyal Arif

author: Danyal Arif
title: Danyal Arif
text: This site is full of cowboys. You can't offer more than $2000 on a job which is ridiculous when someone wants a 3 bed house painted. Cowboys are bidding stupidly low prices to get the jobs and ruining it for us professionals. They have no knowledge. I know this as they bid without asking any basic questions and when the job has no description or pictures! Waste of time. And airtasker charging 15% of the job is just a joke.
